headline: A Look At Teledyne Technologies (TDY) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength

headline: Teledyne to Hold Investor Meetings
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., January 15, 2026--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) today announced that Jason VanWees, Vice Chairman, will be holding virtual investor meetings at the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference on Friday, January 16.

raw.headline: Teledyne to Hold Investor Meetings
raw.summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif., January 15, 2026--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) today announced that Jason VanWees, Vice Chairman, will be holding virtual investor meetings at the 28th Annual Needham Growth Conference on Friday, January 16.

headline: Teledyne Acquires DD-Scientific, Expands Gas Sensing Portfolio
summary: TDY acquires DD-Scientific, adding advanced gas sensors to expand its sensing portfolio across medical, industrial safety and environmental markets.

raw.headline: Teledyne Acquires DD-Scientific, Expands Gas Sensing Portfolio
raw.summary: TDY acquires DD-Scientific, adding advanced gas sensors to expand its sensing portfolio across medical, industrial safety and environmental markets.

headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Wins $32 Million Contract to Provide Recon Surveillance Kit on Strykers for Bulgaria
summary: BOSTON, January 15, 2026--Teledyne FLIR Defense, part of Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY), announced that it has been awarded a contract by the U.S. Army worth up to $32 million to deliver and integrate advanced electro-optical (EO/IR) systems for the Stryker Infantry Carrier Vehicle (ICV) Recon Kit.

raw.headline: Teledyne FLIR Defense Wins $32 Million Contract to Provide Recon Surveillance Kit on Strykers for Bulgaria

headline: Billionaire Rams owner Stan Kroenke becomes America's biggest private landowner
summary: Kroenke represents a growing wave of ultra-wealthy entrepreneurs investing in long-held ranches and farmland.
